com.github.ismaeltoe.osms.library.services

Interface CredentialsService


  • public interface CredentialsService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CredentialsEntity getAccessToken(java.lang.String grant_type)
      Retrieves an access token from Orange server.
      void getAccessToken(java.lang.String grant_type, <any> callback)
      Retrieves an access token from Orange server.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessToken

        CredentialsEntity getAccessToken(java.lang.String grant_type)
        Retrieves an access token from Orange server. Synchronous execution.
        Parameters:
        grant_type - must be set to "client_credentials"
        Returns:
        object made of the following fields: "access_token", "token_type", "expires_in"
        See Also:
        https://www.orangepartner.com/content/authorization-oauth2?api=sms_ci_product

      • getAccessToken

        void getAccessToken(java.lang.String grant_type,
                    <any> callback)
        Retrieves an access token from Orange server. Asynchronous execution.
        Parameters:
        grant_type - must be set to "client_credentials"
        callback - Communicates the response from the server. If the request was successful, the response will be a CredentialsEntity object (accessible from success method). Otherwise an error object (accessible from failure method).
        See Also:
        https://www.orangepartner.com/content/authorization-oauth2?api=sms_ci_product
